articles.title: Salisbury poisonings policeman 'still trying to pick up the pieces' - ITV News
articles.description: A police officer who almost died after investigating the Salisbury poisonings said he is still trying to pick up the pieces of his life.Detective Sergeant Nick Bailey has made a third attempt to return to work this week, two years after being poisoned by Novi…

articles.author: Emily Mee
articles.title: A Street Cat Named Bob: Moggie who inspired bestselling book and film dies - Sky News
articles.description: Bob's owner, James Bowen, says "there's never been a cat like him" and that "the light has gone out in my life".
